comments.content: Amazing this mixture of square and round serif.
I bet those serifs were added manually.
I bet the serifs were _removed_ manually. Looks like it started out as some Didot or other. The little bloopy terminals may have been added in.
Mark, you just read my mind, I was going to add that.
eh, so a custom font... thought so. I personally hate it, but I have to use it.
